name: E-SWAT
overview:
E-SWAT IS: the toughest fighting force alive!

E-SWAT MEANS: Enhanced Special Weapons and Tactics! You're staring straight into the evil E.Y.E., a power-mad horde of vicious terrorists. But you are the ultimate crimebuster. Decimate their front fines with your lead-belching Gatling gun! Incinerate their mobs with your super-charged arsenal of weapons! Start as an E-SWAT rookie and blast your way up to become an awesome supercop... More machine than man!

Metal attack! Annihilate killer hovercraft maniac machines and flame-throwing robots. Grapple with bionic monsters to face the final showdown! Stay glued to your weapons through 5 missions of grueling combat! You have the ultra-tech gear and the guts to survive! The E-SWAT force is waiting. Are you ready to "Hit The Streets"?
